title: On the radio
author: VD
content_html: In case you’re interested, I’ll be doing an hour-long interview today from 4-5 EST with Jerry Hughes. There is an online stream to his show, Straight Talk, if you’d like to listen. I believe we’ll be discussing TIA.
content_text:
In case you’re interested, I’ll be doing an hour-long interview today from 4-5 EST with Jerry Hughes. There is an online stream to his show, Straight Talk,
if you’d like to listen
.  I believe we’ll be discussing TIA.
